about_text:
We are non-profit organization that puts the power to save lives in the palms of your hand, makes donating blood as much easy for you. You can easily post urgent blood need here and find it quickly or you can become someone's hero.

If you have any comment or question, please get in touch with us!

If you enjoy using this app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? 

Thanks for your support!
